text: Héctor Eduardo Vargas Bastidas (29 December 1951 – 7 March 2022) was a Chilean Roman Catholic prelate. He was Bishop of Arica from 25 November 2003 until 14 May 2013 and Bishop of Temuco from 14 May 2013 until his death.Bishop Hector Eduardo Vargas Bastidas He was born in Valdivia, Chile. Vargas Bastidas died on 7 March 2022 in Temuco, Chile, at the age of 70."Confirman fallecimiento de obispo de Temuco, Héctor Vargas, criticado por encubrimiento en casos de abuso" . ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chilean Roman Catholic bishops
title: Héctor Vargas Bastidas
